title: Burger Burger
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Survival (after airplane accidents, shipwrecks, etc.)
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Survival (after airplane accidents, shipwrecks, etc.)
abstract: The story of a marooned explorer who meets some local wildlife - with unexpected results.
description: The story of a marooned explorer who meets some local wildlife, with a scary - but eventually serendipitous - outcome. This colourful, fast-paced short animation won Best Animation at the Singapore Short Film Awards 2011.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003006; Commonwealth Connections Animation Showcase; Active; 2014
